name: Ask Cummins Agent
tagline: Chat with trusted Cummins knowledge—policies, manuals, and documentation
overview: Ask Cummins is a conversational interface to Cummins' trusted knowledge base. It enables employees to get answers about policies, procedures, technical documentation, and corporate information through natural language conversation. Grounded in approved sources, it provides accurate information with citations.
whatItDoes: Answers questions about HR policies, benefits, and procedures
Retrieves information from technical manuals and service bulletins
Explains corporate policies and compliance requirements
Summarizes long documents and extracts key information
Provides step-by-step guidance for common processes
prompts: What's the policy on remote work for salaried employees?
Summarize the key changes in the latest ethics policy update
How do I expense international travel?
What are the steps to request a job transfer?
Explain the safety requirements for contractor access
outputs: Links to source documents for verification
Escalation to HR or relevant department when needed

impact.description: Fewer routine policy questions reaching HR team
From hours of searching to instant responses

guardrails: Grounded in approved Cummins sources only—never fabricates information
All answers include citations to source documents
Sensitive topics (termination, harassment) escalate to humans
Human review required for any advice that could have legal implications
Clearly states limitations and recommends human contact when appropriate
whatsNext: Expanding knowledge sources to include more technical documentation. Piloting with additional employee groups before broader rollout.
